title: End-to-End File Sharing Platform
description: Used Go to create an end-to-end encrypted file sharing platform like Google Drive with a public-key database TCB and otherwise public storage leveraging RSA PKE, PBKDF, HashKDF, digital signatures, HMACs, and AES-CTR symmetric encryption to ensure IND-CPA, authenticity, and integrity of all private data.

title: Streamlined Git Style VCS
description: Used Java to create a version-control system that mimics some of the features of Git including active directory moderation, file hashing, merge conflict handling, and remote repository interactions.

title: Emotewell API
description: Developed a REST API using PHP with endpoints for handling mobile app payment authentication and verification through Apple via Bearer authenticated HTTP requests, public-key cryptography through JWT tokens, and SQL for accessing and modifying a MySQL database.

title: Intelligent Grade Portal
description: Developed a secure, intelligent grade portal using Node to create a REST API and handle OAuth2.0 authentication and React with Material UI for the front end to allow professors to easily update their grades and enable students to project their future success in the class.

title: AI Graph Clustering
description: Used machine-level parallelism as well as artificial intelligence techniques such as simulated annealing to preform optimal node clustering on hundreds of graphs each with thousands of nodes in accordance to several nonlinear constraints.

title: This Website :)
description: Used HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JS to create this beauty.  It's all hosted in the back with firebase configured for CICD using GitHub actions.  Oh and I designed it in Figma myself too (though I woulnd't claim to be a designer).

title: Italian Restaurant Website Redesign
description: Used HTML, CSS, JS, and PHP to create an updated website for a popular restaurant in Berkeley using data structures, prototype design techniques, and HTTP requests to dynamically populate menu items.
